m_szDocTitle: Next Big Future: IBM Watson providing superior cancer treatment plans and will accelerate the adoption of new cancer research
m_szDocSumamry: Coverage of Disruptive Science and Technology Forum About Contact Facebook twitter Google February 09, 2013 IBM Watson providing superior cancer treatment plans and will accelerate the adoption of new cancer research artificial intelligence, cancer, databases, future, ibm, medicine, science Facebook Twitter linkedin google Reddit The IBM Watson system gained fame by beating human contestants on the television quiz show Jeopardy! almost two years ago. Since that time, Watson has evolved from a first-of-a-kind status, to a commercial cognitive computing system gaining a 240 percent improvement i
